name: The Program: College Football
description:
You're hired, Coach. Strap on your headset and take the sideline because you've got full control of The Program, the most engaging and realistic College Football management game ever made. Success here is not given, it is earned.

If you want to build a College Football power and challenge for National Championships, you'll need to fully commit to your team. The Program is an immersive College Football experience that's so real you can feel the boosters breathing down your neck.

Features:

• Travel the country, scouting and recruiting top talent
• Hire offense and defensive coordinators, scouts and trainers
• Run practices and set weekly game plans
• Play a full schedule and lead your team to a postseason bowl game
• Participate in weekly press conferences
• Increase your program's prestige and compete for a National Championship!

This app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads). The app also includes:

• In-app purchases that cost real money
• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
